About

Modulonet Since 2024-04
  • Library load a MDF, high resolution tile format based in MS-CFB container format, using binary I/O to work with files inside the container and caching with blobs (ES/JavsScript, MS-CFB, JSDoc)
  • Plugin for OpenSeadragon to load MDF tiles as tile source

(Infrastructure design, Software design)

(Django, GeoDjango, Django REST, PostgreSQL, PostGIS, GDAL)
